name: Petty Hedge
description:
Petty Hedge!

You are a Sentient Hedge Maze!
Someone has invaded your personal space.
You want them out, but as a price for disturbing you, 
it's not going to be easy. 

However, there must always be a way out!
You don't want them stuck in your nether regions.
But, see how long you can keep them from getting out!

Controls:
Left Mouse Button - Grow Hedges
Drag Mouse to Cancel Growth
ESC - Pause Game
R - Reset Maze
I - Controls

In the current build of the game, it is possible
to box the Intruder in so that they can't get out.
Try your best to avoid doing this!

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam 191!
The theme for the Game Jam was Ambush, but I thought to myself,
"but what if. . . amBush?"
From there, I built a game about being a hedge maze, which is just a giant bush!

Dev Team:
Curtis Turpin - Design, Programming, Art
AquaHibiscus - Design, QA, Narrative Design
Jochem Kuipers - Programming Consultation
BluePajamaz - Music
